markdownRemark.excerpt: How to sequence a number in Factory Bot Factory Example Used:
markdownRemark.html:
How to sequence a number in Factory Bot

Factory

sequence(:email) { |n| "person#{n}@example.com" }

factory :user do
  name { "Jane Doe" }
  email

  initialize_with { new(name) }
end

Example Used:

create(:user)

frontmatter.title: Factory bot sequence
frontmatter.description: How to sequence a number in Factory Bot
